resources.string: "Permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Lorem ipsum has become the industry standard
Up to 40% instant discount on your first order
Lorem ipsum has become the industry standard for design mockups and prototypes. By adding a little bit of Latin to a mockup

By registering as a studio you will be able to search and book freelancers.
 

You will not be able to take exposing from others. 
 
 You will be able to take projects from clients.
 
 You can buy cameras and accessories.
 
 You can sell used cameras and equipments.
 
 You can also print your wedding albums. 
 
 You will get access to other features like photography tips, photography news etc.

By registering as a freelancer you will be able to show your free dates, edit your exposing rates day wise using calendar get booking by other studio users and freelancers.
 
 You can also book other freelancers.
 
 You can buy cameras and accessories, you can sell used cameras and equipments.
 
 You can also print your wedding albums.
 
 As a freelancer, you can not take direct order from clients.
 
 You will get access to other features like photography tips, photography related news etc.
A new version of Photo People is available. Please update to version\s
